content.html:
Migrated from a gazebo_ros_pkgs issue (note that they're using 1.9)

Hi, as part of our QA process, we compile our code with -Werror=overloaded-virtual in order to detect method overrides which by mistake don't exactly match the base class corresponding method. As classes inheriting from Base don't implement all overload of some methods, we get the following line. I'd appreciate if you can add "using Base::METHOD_NAME" for the issues below.

best regards

>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>><<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<
